trans-unit.source: Stores the font format attributes.
trans-unit.target: Almacena los atributos de formato de fuente.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat> class is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat> clase es utilizada por la <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> clase.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The style to create the new formatter from.
trans-unit.target: Estilo a partir del cual se creará el nuevo formateador.

trans-unit.source: The format to create the new formatter from.
trans-unit.target: Formato a partir del cual se creará el nuevo formateador.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: This constructor looks first to the given style for the values of <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Bold%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Italic%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Size%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este constructor busca primero en el estilo determinado para los valores de <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Bold%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Italic%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Size%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If any of the corresponding properties of the `style` are <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption.NotSet>, this constructor looks to the corresponding properties of the `currentFormat` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Si cualquiera de las propiedades correspondientes de la `style` son <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption.NotSet>, este constructor examina las propiedades correspondientes de la `currentFormat` parámetro.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set format to bold; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para establecer el formato en negrita; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set format to italic; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para establecer el formato en cursiva; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The font size to be used in writing.
trans-unit.target: El tamaño de fuente que se va a utilizar al escribir.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns whether the font is bold.
trans-unit.target: Establece o devuelve si la fuente está en negrita.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize.NotSet" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the font is bold; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si la fuente es negrita; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Bold%2A> property takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption> enumeration, not a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Bold%2A> propiedad toma un <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption> enumeración, no un valor booleano.

trans-unit.source: The format object to compare.
trans-unit.target: Objeto de formato que se va a comparar.

trans-unit.source: Compares a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" /> object to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Compara un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" /> con el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Bold" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Italic" />, and <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Size" /> properties have the same values in both <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" /> objects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si las propiedades <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Bold" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Italic" /> y <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Size" /> tienen los mismos valores en ambos objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Compare%2A> method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Compare%2A> método se llama internamente en la <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> clase.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the font is italic.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si la fuente está en cursiva.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize.NotSet" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the font is italic; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si la fuente es cursiva; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Italic%2A> property takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption> enumeration, not a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Italic%2A> propiedad toma un <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption> enumeración, no un valor booleano.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified font size.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el tamaño de fuente especificado.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value representing the size of the font.
trans-unit.target: Un valor enumerado que representa el tamaño de la fuente.

trans-unit.source: Must be of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize>.
trans-unit.target: Debe ser de tipo <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize.NotSet>.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize.NotSet>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the text was written with the bold attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si el texto se escribió con el atributo de negrita.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text was written with the bold attribute; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el texto se ha escrito con el atributo de negrita; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.WrittenBold%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat> class are used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.WrittenBold%2A> propiedad y el <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat> clase usan el <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> clase.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the text was written with the italic attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si el texto se escribió con el atributo de cursiva.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text was written with the italic attribute; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el texto se ha escrito con el atributo de cursiva; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.WrittenItalic%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat> class are used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.WrittenItalic%2A> propiedad y el <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat> clase usan el <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> clase.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the text was written with the size attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si el texto se escribió con el atributo de tamaño.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo desarrollar aplicaciones ASP.NET para dispositivos móviles, vea <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps y sitios con ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text was written with the size attribute; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el texto se ha escrito con el atributo de tamaño; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.WrittenSize%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat> class are used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.WrittenSize%2A> propiedad y el <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat> clase usan el <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> clase.
